emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Autonomy
emerging_technologies.description: AI-powered tools like Cursor AI evolve to autonomously write, debug, and optimize code, significantly enhancing developer productivity.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: This technology could reduce the need for human coders in routine tasks, potentially leading to job displacement but also increasing software development speed and quality.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption depends on AI's ability to handle complex coding tasks, regulatory acceptance of AI in software development, and integration with existing development tools.

emerging_technologies.name: Urban Autonomous Transport Networks
emerging_technologies.description: Expansion of autonomous vehicle technology to create interconnected transport networks in urban environments, reducing congestion and emissions.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improved urban mobility, reduced accidents, and potential job displacement in transportation sectors. Ethical considerations include privacy in data collection for navigation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, infrastructure readiness, public acceptance of autonomous vehicles, and integration with existing transportation systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Cognitive Augmentation
emerging_technologies.description: Development of neural interfaces that enhance human cognitive abilities, memory storage, and processing speed.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises questions about the nature of human intelligence, privacy of thoughts, and potential inequality in access to cognitive enhancements.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ethical and regulatory hurdles, technological breakthroughs in neural interface safety and efficiency, and societal acceptance of human enhancement.

emerging_technologies.name: Interplanetary Resource Management
emerging_technologies.description: Systems for managing resources on extraterrestrial bodies, including mining, processing, and distribution of materials.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to new economic models, environmental concerns about space, and ethical issues around ownership and exploitation of space resources.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological advancements in space robotics, economic viability, international space law, and public perception of space colonization.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI Assistants evolve from simple task helpers to sophisticated personal and professional aids.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in personal devices, businesses, and educational settings, with integration into daily life activities.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain-Enhanced Digital Identity
mainstream_technologies.description: Blockchain technology used for secure, decentralized digital identity verification.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becomes standard in financial, governmental, and online services for identity management.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of AI into all aspects of life, from personal assistance to industrial automation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Transformation of job markets, enhancement of human capabilities, and potential for increased surveillance or privacy issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Shift towards automated services, AI-driven decision making, and the need for new ethical frameworks for AI governance.

epoch_themes.description: Expansion of human presence and economic activities into space.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: New opportunities for resource extraction, potential for space tourism, and geopolitical implications of space colonization.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased investment in space technology, international collaboration or competition in space, and the emergence of a space economy.
